name: Space Pixel RPG
description:
This is not a complete version of the game...

Space Pixel RPG is a fantastic ship game in which you can destroy enemies, level up to improve hp and attack.

Do not miss this unforgettable adventure of 7 levels.

Controls

Arrow Keys (Left and Right)

Power by Godot Engine

Requirements: OpenGL 3.3 / OpenGL ES 3.0

Github: https://github.com/MatiasVME/space-pixel-rpg
